Package gui

Class ColorTheme

java.lang.Object
gui.ColorTheme
public class ColorTheme extends Object
This class encapsulates the selection of colors for the game. The purpose is to support a specific theme such that colors are used consistently across the user interface. The class internally works with a Singleton pattern. Client classes: Wall, CompassRose, FirstPersonView, Map, SimpleScreens
Author:
Peter Kemper

  • Method Details

    • getColor

      public static Color getColor​(ColorTheme.MazeColors color)

    • getColor

      public static Color getColor​(int rgb)
      Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified combined RGB value consisting of the red component in bits 16-23, the green component in bits 8-15, and the blue component in bits 0-7. The actual color used in rendering depends on finding the best match given the color space available for a particular output device. Alpha is defaulted to 255.
      Parameters:
      rgb - the rgb value
      Returns:
      the matching instance of a color

    • setColorTheme

      public static void setColorTheme​(ColorTheme.ColorThemeSelection selection)

    • getColor

      public static Color getColor​(ColorTheme.MazeColors color, float percentToExit)
      Determine the background color for the top and bottom rectangle. The resulting color choices depend on the configuration of the ColorTheme either being basic or advanced. In the basic settings the top is black, the bottom is dark gray regardless of the percentToExit. In the advanced setting the color is a blend between the starting color settings of yellowWM and lightGray towards goldWM and greenWM as final color settings close to the exit
      Parameters:
      percentToExit - describes how far it is to the exit as a percentage value
      color - is BACKGROUND_TOP for the upper rectangle or BACKGROUND_BOTTTOM for the lower one
      Returns:
      the color to use for the background rectangle

    • getWallColor

      public static int getWallColor​(int distance, int cc, int extensionX)
      Determines the color for a wall. Supports color determination for the Wall constructor method. See also https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/static-method-in-interface-in-java/
      Parameters:
      distance - is the distance to the exit
      cc - is an obscure parameter used in Wall for color determination, just passed in here
      extensionX - is the wall's length and direction (sign), horizontal dimension
      Returns:
      the rgb value for the color of the wall
